properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI; St Ignace to False Detour Channel; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 2:05AM EST until March 2 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 5
feet expected.

* WHERE...5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI
including Bois Blanc Island, Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI,
Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay
National Marine Sanctuary and St Ignace to False Detour
Channel.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 2 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM EST MONDAY
